heading: Creating a table in SQL

explains.INT: The data type is a whole number
explains.VARCHAR(?): The data type is a word/phrase
explains.NCHAR(?): The data type is a word/phrase that will always have a specific number of characters (Spaces may be appended to the end)
explains.(NOT) NULL: Used to specify whether this field can be left blank (NULL) or not (NOT NULL)

exampleDescription: This query is used to create a new table in a database with three columns, Id, Name and Age
